title: Erewhon Market
description: The flagship location of this independent natural food market, established since the 1960s. Features a deli, hot foods and salad bar, juice bar, plus has an extensive selection of health and natural care products, vitamins, supplements, packaged foods, snacks, fresh fruits and vegetables including organic, bulk staples, refrigerated foods, and more. An herbal teas and tonics bar inside with booth seating as well as sidewalk tables for eating.
